overview:
IFCM Group is a group of сompanies which activity is involved in development and implementation of various projects in the field of financial technologies.

The activity of the IFCM Group conforms to international brokerage and financial services legislation.

The IFCM Group consists of: IFC Markets Corp. IFC Markets Corp. is incorporated in British Virgin Islands under the registration number 669838. IFC Markets Corp. offers brokerage services to clients of IFCM Group dealing in financial instruments trading at the World’s most important established market places and beyond using trading-analytical platforms NetTradeX and MetaTrader 4. IFC Markets Corp. is a licensee of a new generation trading platform NetTradeX.

I Securities Global Ltd. I Securities Global Ltd. is incorporated in British Virgin Islands under the registration number 1530297. I-Securities Global Ltd. is a licensee of the MetaTrader 4 trading platform.

IFCM Consulting Limited IFCM Consulting Limited is incorporated in Gibraltar under the registration number 96763. IFCM Consulting is the IFCM Group’s promotion and marketing Company. The main distinctive feature of the IFCM Group is trading in a new generation trading platform NetTradeX from the NetTradeX company.

IFCM Group sees its main aim in providing its customers with services of the highest level which most distinctive characteristics are the following: request-free trading (straight from the screen) regardless of the trading amount, instant execution, low spreads, no commission, online account opening withing several minutes from anywhere in the World, 24 hours technical support. IFCM Group is focused on cooperation with a large number of Introducing Brokers in many countries of the World. Our IB programme offers our partners the most competitive commission rates in the Industry.
